entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
